data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Batticaloa.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Batticaloa, Sri Lanka
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Batticaloa. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Batticaloa, Sri Lanka.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Pour your Spirit out on the 92,400 citizens of Batticaloa, Sri Lanka, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Batticaloa, Sri Lanka honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Sayyid people might believe through him.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Batticaloa, Sri Lanka to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Batticaloa, Sri Lanka.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Batticaloa, Sri Lanka to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

location.name: Batticaloa
location.people_groups_list: Radayo, Sri Lanka Moor, Tondagattan, Viswakarma, Sindhi (Muslim traditions)
